title: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). During this time, the system does not show a busy cursor to indicate that it is busy updating.
EB: The system should display a busy cursor while updating the checked state of the table.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software application. 
2. Navigate to the table where the checkbox states are updated. 
3. Observe that it takes a long time for the updates to be reflected. 
4. Note that there is no busy cursor shown during this time.
